game_description: Japanese-style command-type action game. You will command the two Shikigami. The coalescing attack is exhilarating. Please experience the Youkai tale! • Method of operation For hand tracking only. The move is automatic. Although it is a command button format, some operations are also performed by gestures: 1.Turn your palm up The menu screen for each Shikigami is displayed. 2.Turn both hands forward(Both hands are Paper) If the item appears, you can collect it. 3.Hold your fist with the palms of both hands facing up and accumulate power If you have a Ofuda-item, you can use the combined attack. • How to proceed with the game 1.Start Press the[Start]button -> [Beginning]button with your index finger to start. (You can skip the opening by selecting the[Start]button -> [Battle]button) 2.GamePlay Once started, the move is automatic. We will command the two Shikigami. 3.GameOver If both Shikigami are defeated, the game is over. 4.GameClear The game is cleared when the boss is defeated.
review_1: It's more like a demo/beta, but imo it actually has good potential to become a real hand tracking game. There are English subs, so you can understand the dialogue and texts.
